net.lapismc.lapischat.framework.ChatPlayer

    net.lapismc.lapischat.events

    • Uses of ChatPlayer in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework

      Fields in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework with type parameters of type ChatPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected List<ChatPlayer> Channel.players 
      Methods in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework that return types with arguments of type ChatPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected List<ChatPlayer> Channel.getRecipients(ChatPlayer p)
      Returns the players that will receive a message if it was sent by p By default this returns the list of players in the channel this is overridden by other channels to specify distance or faction association
      Methods in net.lapismc.lapischat.framework with parameters of type ChatPlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Channel.addPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
      This method wil call Channel.forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer), it is primarily here to be overridden for things like password checks
      protected String Channel.applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format) 
      protected void Channel.forceAddPlayer(ChatPlayer p)
      This should only be called if you want to add the player based on a permission or other system rather then a player joining a channel of their own accord
      protected abstract String Channel.format(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format)
      This must be implemented by all channels, by default it should return Channel.applyDefaultFormat(ChatPlayer, String, String) This is can be used to apply extra per channel formatting tags
      protected List<ChatPlayer> Channel.getRecipients(ChatPlayer p)
      Returns the players that will receive a message if it was sent by p By default this returns the list of players in the channel this is overridden by other channels to specify distance or faction association
      void Channel.sendMessage(ChatPlayer from, String msg, String format)
      Sends a message to the recipients of the channel NOTE: The format must already be filled in, use Channel.format(ChatPlayer, String, String) to apply the format
